import React, {useState,useContext} from 'react' import { CartContext } from './Cart'; const Items = ({id,title,description,img,price,quantity}) => { const {removeItem,increment,decrement} = useContext(CartContext); return ( <>

{title}

{description}

decrement(id)}> increment(id)}>

{price}

removeItem(id)}>
) } export default Items
